name: Satyavrat
h2: Some ten years ago ... ye wala part
p1_desc: He is very polite and charming. He is always very helpful. He absolutely loves all the people he is in contact with. He never ever hates anybody.
p2_desc: Remember sattu one whole night we sat outside fk and watched horror videos. Well that night was very scary. Remember when the baby out of nowhere started crying. And we still don't know where the baby was ðŸ˜›ðŸ˜›ðŸ˜›
shortText2: And so to say all of us...
